comment: Professor Bell is one of the best teachers at KSU! She is so relatable and she really cares! She makes public speaking easy and she ensures you are comfortable with speaking! I am not the best speaker but she definitely made me a better one! I would take this class a million times again if I could! I will truly miss her class! P.S SHOW UP TO CLASS!

Professor Bell is the best! Her class was so enjoyable. There are weekly homework assignments on Revel - very easy. She highlights everything in the notes that will be on the test. EASY A. Although attendance is mandatory and she gives 4 free absences.

Such an amazing professor. The class is a very easy A if you go to class, take pictures of her chapter outline notes ( she does go through them fast), and then study what she has highlighted and underlined. I made As on all the tests which were 20% each and then theres revel which you literally google and find the entire chapter so easy 100s

I enjoyed this class so much! She really enjoys actually talking to and getting to know her students. We had great group discussions everyday! Show up to class, participate, do the homework, and you will be fine

Ms. Bell is by far the best teacher in the Communications department. During the pandemic, she was consistent and quick with new updates. Her lectures are actually entertaining to attend. Overall, THE ideal teacher.

absolutely loved her. she is so fun to be around & made us laugh & have a good time. i hate going to class but i genuinely enjoyed going to hers. she has great lectures & does online work but if you do all of that on time & get decent grades on her 4 tests youll be fine. take her.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Hilarious--Graded by few things

comment: Great teacher. Teaches not just as a teacher but from a realistic standpoint. She teaches from experience. Her Human Communication class is graded by 4 exams and homework which is given online. The homework is pretty easy if you use google and if you take notes in class, the exams are a breeze.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: very nice. class is easy. however there are only 4 test and then a small portion of your grade is based on online work. lots of it. i would have had a B if there were more assignments
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: TAKE HER. you will actually learn. 4 tests, and they're very easy if you study the vocab she gives you. there is no way you fail this class unless you don't go and don't study. weekly online assignment, very easy and all on quizlet. super nice and personal. she cancels 2 classes a semester. 4 free absences. responds to emails super fast

I love Professor Bell, and honestly she just wants to see everyone pass! The speeches are so easy, and she doesn't expect that much either. Everything is simple, and its all on you really to give the best speech you can. The tests are so easy, and she even tells you what to specifically study. TAKE PROFESSOR BELL!!

This class isn't hard at all and you will get an A if you just try and pay attention. Her lectures go right along with the textbook and nothing on the exam will be anything you have not seen before. Exam questions are straight forward and she teaches in a way that engages students. If you need this class definitely take it with her, she's great.
